// include º before the hyperlink to make it clickable The Devcomms app is coded by the community members. Architecturally, this is built with the new Android Architecture components and Firebase. All of this is coded natively. 

See the repo and read more at: ºhttps://github.com/GDLDevComms/DevComms About the community Devcomms conferences around the world support the Android platform and create a global network for developers and companies. 

We offer best-in-class presentations from leaders in all parts of the Android ecosystem, including core development, embedded solutions, augmented reality, business solutions, and games
